mapper.select: SELECT title, description, postDate, view, article_code AS articleCode FROM blog_article LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT ba.article_code, ba.title, ba.description, ba.postDate, ba.`view` FROM blog_mid_category_article mca JOIN blog_category bc ON mca.category_name = bc.`name` JOIN blog_article ba ON mca.article_id = ba.article_code WHERE bc.`name` = #{categoryName}
